NEWS
Pampanga Giant Lanterns Shine in Semifinal Opener against Caloocan
The Pampanga Giant Lanterns showcased their dominance as they secured a resounding 73-64 victory over the Caloocan Batang Kankaloo in the first game of the MPBL North Division semifinal series. This thrilling showdown took place at the Brenz Z. Guiao Sports Center in San Fernando, Pampanga, on a Friday. In ‚Ä¶
NEWS
GenSan vs. Muntinlupa MPBL Quarter Finals Recap
In an exhilarating MPBL quarterfinal showdown, the GenSan Warriors clashed with the Muntinlupa Cagers in a high-stakes battle for a spot in the south division semifinals. The game came to a decision when Warriors Nico Elorde converted both of his free throws, putting the final nail to the coffin. This ‚Ä¶
NEWS
Caloocan Advances to MPBL Semi Finals, Beats Pasig
Like the previous two games, Caloocan‚Äôs Batang Kankaloo found themselves in a tight battle against Pasig, with both teams trading punches before the former eventually triumphed over their tenacious opponent. This victory secured their position in the division‚Äôs Final Four and moved them to the semi-finals, where they will face ‚Ä¶
NEWS
MPBL: Batangas sweeps Imus SV Squad, Advances to Semifinals of South Division
In an exciting showdown at the Strike Gymnasium in Bacoor, Cavite on Tuesday, Batangas City Embassy Chill Athletics breezed for a spot in the semifinals of the MPBL Fifth Season playoffs, sweeping Imus SV Squad, 61-59, in a best-of-three quarter final series in the South division. A notable return to ‚Ä¶
NEWS
Manalang takes over Pasig, Beats Caloocan in Do-or-Die at the MPBL Playoffs
Robbie Manalang emerged as Pasig‚Äôs hero, nailing a game-winning three-pointer in the last minute, silencing the Caloocan crowd with a 65-61 win in Game 2 of the MPBL playoffs. With Manalang on the helm, Pasig avenged their 71-69 loss in Game 1, forcing the series to reach three games to ‚Ä¶

About us
MPBL Updates wants to give you information and entertainment. We want to create an experience that pulls you in with exciting stories and beautiful pictures and makes you want to return for more. Our MPBL Update Page is where you can find game reports, player bios, behind-the-scenes stories, and detailed analyses.

HomeMPBLMPBL Live Updates, Schedule & Results (2023 Regular Season) Maharlika Pilipinas January 12, 2024
0Photo credit: facebook.com/mpblofficialphMPBL 2023 Live Updates, Live Stream, Team Standings, Schedule, Live Scores and Results. The 2023 Maharlika Pilipinas Basketball League Regular Season, MPBL's 5th Season, begins on March 11, 2023 at the Quezon Convention Center in Lucena City with 30 29 teams, including newcomers Negros Muscovados and Quezon Province Huskers, to be divided into the North and South divisions.Defending national champion Nueva Ecija, Bataan, Bulacan, Caloocan, Makati, Manila, Marikina, Pampanga, Paranaque, Pasay, Pasig City, Quezon City, Rizal, San Juan, and Valenzuela are the other provinces that make up the Northern Division.Bacolod, Bacoor, Batangas, Bicol, Cebu, GenSan, Iloilo, Imus, Laguna, Mindoro, Muntinlupa, Negros, Quezon, and Sarangani are grouped with the 2023 MPBL preseason champion Zamboanga in the Southern Division.MPBL Official Social Media Accounts / MPBL Team Roster, Lineup or PlayersFacebook | Twitter | InstagramMPBL Team StandingsRankNORTHERN DIVISIONWINLOSSSTREAK1Pampanga Giant Lanterns (NATIONAL Champions)262+62Nueva Ecija Rice Vanguards235+23Makati OKBet Kings217+44Caloocan - Batang Kankaloo208+35Pasig City MCW Sports199+16San Juan Knights199-47Pasay Voyagers1711-18Marikina Shoemasters1612+291Bataan Risers Camaya Coast (x)1315-310Rizal Golden Coolers (x)1216+111Para√±aque Patriots (x)1117-212Bulacan Kuyas (x)721-113Manila Stars (x)423-114Quezon City TODA Aksyon V Fresh (x)325-1715Valenzuela XUR Homes Realty Inc.
